entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Colborne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 10. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 09:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
